text: Adudagi phambal adugi mayaida Yaomacha ama thawaipanba mari amadi ahal-lamansing aduna koisinduna leptuna leiba eina ure. Yaomacha adu hatkhrabagumba amagum urammi. Yaomacha adugi machi taret amadi mamit taret pallammi, makhoi adu malemgi mapham sinba thungna thakhiba Tengban Mapugi thawai taretni.
